00035 inline void __swapEndianInt(unsigned int& ui)
00036 {
00037         ui = ((ui >> 24) | ((ui<<8) & 0x00FF0000) | ((ui>>8) & 0x0000FF00) | (ui << 24));
00038 }

00041 
00042 lbann::DataReader_MNIST::DataReader_MNIST(int batchSize, bool shuffle)
00043   : DataReader(batchSize, shuffle)
00044 {
00045         ImageWidth = 28;
00046         ImageHeight = 28;
00047         NumLabels = 10;
00048 }
00049 
00050 lbann::DataReader_MNIST::DataReader_MNIST(int batchSize)
00051   : DataReader_MNIST(batchSize, true) {}
00052 
00053 lbann::DataReader_MNIST::DataReader_MNIST(const DataReader_MNIST& source)
00054   : DataReader((const DataReader&) source), 
00055   ImageWidth(source.ImageWidth), ImageHeight(source.ImageHeight),
00056   NumLabels(source.NumLabels)
00057 {
00058   // No need to deallocate data on a copy constuctor
00059 
00060   clone_image_data(source);
00061 }
00062 
00063 lbann::DataReader_MNIST::~DataReader_MNIST()
00064 {
00065         this->free();
00066 }
00067 
00068 int lbann::DataReader_MNIST::fetch_data(Mat& X)
00069 {
00070   if(!DataReader::position_valid()) {
00071     return 0;
00072   }
00073 
00074   int pixelcount = ImageWidth * ImageHeight;
00075   int current_batch_size = getBatchSize();
00076 
00077   int n = 0;
00078   for (n = CurrentPos; n < CurrentPos + current_batch_size; n++) {
00079     if (n >= (int)ShuffledIndices.size())
00080       break;
00081 
00082     int k = n - CurrentPos;
00083     int index = ShuffledIndices[n];
00084     unsigned char* data = ImageData[index];
00085     unsigned char* pixels = &data[1];
00086     unsigned char label = data[0];
00087 
00088     for (int p = 0; p < pixelcount; p++) {
00089       X.Set(p, k, pixels[p] / 255.0f);
00090     }
00091   }
00092 
00093         return (n - CurrentPos);
00094 }
00095 
00096 int lbann::DataReader_MNIST::fetch_label(Mat& Y)
00097 {
00098   if(!DataReader::position_valid()) {
00099     return 0;
00100   }
00101 
00102   int current_batch_size = getBatchSize();
00103   int n = 0;
00104   for (n = CurrentPos; n < CurrentPos + current_batch_size; n++) {
00105     if (n >= (int)ShuffledIndices.size())
00106       break;
00107 
00108     int k = n - CurrentPos;
00109     int index = ShuffledIndices[n];
00110     unsigned char* data = ImageData[index];
00111     unsigned char label = data[0];
00112 
00113     Y.Set(label, k, 1);
00114   }
00115 
00116         return (n - CurrentPos);
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool lbann::DataReader_MNIST::load(string FileDir, string ImageFile, string LabelFile)
00120 {
00121         this->free();
00122 
00123   // set filepath
00124   string imagepath = FileDir + __DIR_DELIMITER + ImageFile;
00125   string labelpath = FileDir + __DIR_DELIMITER + LabelFile;
00126 
00127   // read labels
00128   FILE* fplbl = fopen(labelpath.c_str(), "rb");
00129   if (!fplbl)
00130     return false;
00131 
00132   int magicnum1, numitems1;
00133   fread(&magicnum1, 4, 1, fplbl);
00134   fread(&numitems1, 4, 1, fplbl);
00135   __swapEndianInt((unsigned int&)magicnum1);
00136   __swapEndianInt((unsigned int&)numitems1);
00137 
00138   // read images
00139   FILE* fpimg = fopen(imagepath.c_str(), "rb");
00140   if (!fpimg)
00141     return false;
00142 
00143   int magicnum2, numitems2, imgwidth, imgheight;
00144   fread(&magicnum2, 4, 1, fpimg);
00145   fread(&numitems2, 4, 1, fpimg);
00146   fread(&imgwidth, 4, 1, fpimg);
00147   fread(&imgheight, 4, 1, fpimg);
00148   __swapEndianInt((unsigned int&)magicnum2);
00149   __swapEndianInt((unsigned int&)numitems2);
00150   __swapEndianInt((unsigned int&)imgwidth);
00151   __swapEndianInt((unsigned int&)imgheight);
00152 
00153   if (numitems1 != numitems2) {
00154     fclose(fplbl);
00155     fclose(fpimg);
00156     return false;
00157   }
00158 
00159   // set to array
00160   for (int n = 0; n < numitems1; n++) {
00161     unsigned char* data = new unsigned char[1 + imgwidth * imgheight];
00162     fread(&data[0], 1, 1, fplbl);
00163     fread(&data[1], imgwidth * imgheight, 1, fpimg);
00164 
00165     ImageData.push_back(data);
00166   }
00167   fclose(fpimg);
00168   fclose(fplbl);
00169 
00170   // reset indices
00171   ShuffledIndices.clear();
00172   ShuffledIndices.resize(ImageData.size());
00173   for (size_t n = 0; n < ShuffledIndices.size(); n++) {
00174     ShuffledIndices[n] = n;
00175   }
00176 
00177         return true;
00178 }
00179 
00180 bool lbann::DataReader_MNIST::load(string FileDir, string ImageFile, string LabelFile, size_t max_sample_count, bool firstN) {
00181   bool load_successful = false;
00182 
00183   load_successful = load(FileDir, ImageFile, LabelFile);
00184 
00185   if(max_sample_count > getNumData() || ((long) max_sample_count) < 0) {
00186     throw lbann_exception("MNIST data reader load error: invalid number of samples selected");
00187   }
00188   select_subset_of_data(max_sample_count, firstN);
00189 
00190   return load_successful;
00191 }
00192 
00193 bool lbann::DataReader_MNIST::load(string FileDir, string ImageFile, string LabelFile, double use_percentage, bool firstN) {
00194   bool load_successful = false;
00195 
00196   load_successful = load(FileDir, ImageFile, LabelFile);
00197 
00198   size_t max_sample_count = rint(getNumData()*use_percentage);
00199 
00200   if(max_sample_count > getNumData() || ((long) max_sample_count) < 0) {
00201     throw lbann_exception("MNIST data reader load error: invalid number of samples selected");
00202   }
00203   select_subset_of_data(max_sample_count, firstN);
00204 
00205   return load_successful;
00206 }
00207 
00208 void lbann::DataReader_MNIST::free()
00209 {
00210   for (size_t n = 0; n < ImageData.size(); n++) {
00211     unsigned char* data = ImageData[n];
00212     delete [] data;
00213   }
00214   ImageData.clear();
00215 }
00216 
00217 // Assignment operator
00218 lbann::DataReader_MNIST& lbann::DataReader_MNIST::operator=(const DataReader_MNIST& source)
00219 {
00220   // check for self-assignment
00221   if (this == &source)
00222     return *this;
00223 
00224   // Call the parent operator= function
00225   DataReader::operator=(source);
00226 
00227   // first we need to deallocate any data that this data reader is holding!
00228   for (size_t n = 0; n < ImageData.size(); n++) {
00229     unsigned char* data = ImageData[n];
00230     delete [] data;
00231   }
00232   ImageData.clear();
00233 
00234   this->ImageWidth = source.ImageWidth;
00235   this->ImageHeight = source.ImageHeight;
00236   this->NumLabels = source.NumLabels;
00237 
00238   clone_image_data(source);
00239   return *this;
00240 }
00241 
00242 void lbann::DataReader_MNIST::clone_image_data(const DataReader_MNIST& source) {
00243   // ImageData has pointers, so we need to deep copy them
00244   for (size_t n = 0; n < source.ImageData.size(); n++) {
00245     unsigned char* data = new unsigned char[1 + ImageWidth * ImageHeight];
00246     unsigned char* src_data = source.ImageData[n];
00247 
00248     for (size_t i = 0; i < 1 + ImageWidth * ImageHeight; i++) {
00249       data[i] = src_data[i];
00250     }
00251     ImageData.push_back(data);
00252   }
00253   return;
00254 }
